verbose_text: Higher CNS virus replication early during JHMV infection in PKR -/- relative to wt mice, in the absence of overt defects in Ifn-alpha / beta mRNA or ISGs induction, supported PKR mediated antiviral activity in vivo.
evidence: CNS virus replication early during JHMV infection in PKR -/-  relative to wt mice, in the absence of overt defects in Ifn-alpha/beta mRNA or ISGs induction, supported PKR
